refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function decrypts data. Note that the length of the returned string can in fact be longer then the unencrypted string, due to the padding of the data.

example.title: mdecrypt_generic Example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$iv_size = mcrypt_enc_get_iv_size ($td));
$iv = @mcrypt_create_iv ($iv_size, MCRYPT_RAND);

if (@mcrypt_generic_init ($td, $key, $iv) != -1)
{
    $c_t = mcrypt_generic ($td, $plain_text);
    @mcrypt_generic_init ($td, $key, $iv);
    $p_t = mdecrypt_generic ($td, $c_t);
}
if (strncmp ($p_t, $plain_text, strlen($plain_text)) == 0)
    echo "ok";
else
    echo "error";
?>
example.para: The above example shows how to check if the data before the encryption is the same as the data after the decryption.
